help.weather: usage: weather 85226. This will return forecast from an area code entered.
help.purge room: usage: purge room. This will clear the room history.
help.clear joins: usage: clear joins. This will clear all user joined room messages.
help.movies: usage: movies {Movie Title}. This will list my favorite movie...for now.
help.nasa: usage nasa photo or nasa photo 2017-10-10. Using photo gives you today's nasa image. Otherwise, specify a date
help.define: usage: define crazy. This will provide the definition of any word in the oxford dictionary
help.syn-ant: usage: syn-ant ace. This will provide the synonym and antonyms of a word
help.books: usage: books enders game. This will provide book information for any book on GoodReads
help.spacex: usage: spacex. This will display the next SpaceX launch and all relevant info for the launch.
help.bitcoin: usage: bitcoin. This will return the bitcoin market values & trends
help.lat-long: usage: lat-long auckland nz. This will return the latitude and longitude of a city / state (country)
help.shorten: usage: shorten https://www.theverge.com. This will take a long URL and shorten it
help.xkcd: usage: xkcd (or xkcd 600). If left as xkcd, it will return the current day's comic. Otherwise, it will return the comic number listed.
help.stocks: usage: stocks aapl. This will return the stock value and trend info for the symbol listed.
help.chuck-norris: usage: chuck-norris. This will return random funny jokes with Chuck Norris.
help.numbers: usage: numbers. This will return random number facts.
help.joke: usage: joke. This will return a random joke.
help.trivia: usage: trivia. This will return trivia questions that are on Jeopardy.

purge room: hides room history in slack channel
clear joins: remove all user has joined channel messages
